title: Does whatever choice you make make you? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. Everything you choose to do speak about you & every experience shape you personality. But never be afraid to make a choice..just do what you feel like doing… at the end everything makes a point. And you will be happy for you decisions.

Yes every choice we make is the not just the shadow self, its we in it. We are responsible for the choices we make and the situation we get into. Coz the choice's we make is the conscious aspect of what personality we are. And its just not the choice its the decision. Life is about the things we have done(CHOICE'S TAKEN) in past, is what will lead us to the things we will do in the future.
